message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Its value is undeniable, and I believe it has the potential to be a game-changer for you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. This is a rare chance to own something truly special.
I appreciate the exclusivity of the product, but I'm not willing to pay $1,500,000. I'm willing to offer $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant.  It's worth the investment for the right buyer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,400,000.  I believe this reflects its true worth.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not convinced that $1,400,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to offer $1,250,000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering its value to me.

Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer to a deal that benefits both of us. I'm willing to consider $1,325,000. This is a significant concession on my end, reflecting my desire to see this product in your capable hands.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $1,325,000. I'm willing to offer $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I've tried to be flexible. However, I need to be upfront â€“ I have another buyer ready to purchase at $1,000,000.  I'd much rather see this go to you, but I'm not willing to go below $1,275,000. This is my final offer.

I understand you have another buyer ready to purchase at $1,000,000, but I'm not willing to pay $1,275,000. I'm willing to offer $1,225,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering its value to me.
